name: green vs red Beta
description:
green vs red is a fps game where you fight ais!

your a player in war. kill all the players to win!

there is 5  maps desert, forest, village, farm and Forest 2.0

4 guns normal, normal upgraded, shoot gun and luper.

you can select how many ais that spawns.

and i will realse new updates with new maps and other stuff.

plz comment bug or ideas!

there is 4 gamemodes: you with ai vs ai, you vs ai, competetive and spectate!

info website pre-alpha

https://salmmanfred.github.io/
